verses.verse: And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Depart <S%H3212><s%>, and go up <S%H5927><s%> here <S%H5971><s%>, you and the people which you have brought up <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, unto the land <S%H776><s%> which I swore <S%H7650><s%> unto Abraham <S%H85><s%>, to Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Unto your seed <S%H2233><s%> will I give it <S%H5414><s%>:

And I will send <S%H7971><s%> an angel <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you and I will drive out <S%H1644><s%> the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>, the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, and the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%>, the Hivite <S%H2340><s%>, and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%>:

Unto a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>: for I will not go up <S%H5927><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you for you are a stiffnecked <S%H7186><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>: lest I consume <S%H3615><s%> you in the way <S%H1870><s%>.

And when the people <S%H5971><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> these evil <S%H7451><s%> news <S%H1697><s%>, they mourned <S%H56><s%>: and no man <S%H376><s%> did put <S%H7896><s%> on him his jewelry <S%H5716><s%>.

For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Say <S%H559><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, You are a stiffnecked <S%H7186><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>: If I were to come up <S%H5927><s%> into the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you in a <S%H259><s%> moment <S%H7281><s%>, I would consume <S%H3615><s%> you <S%H3381><s%>: therefore now put off your jewelry <S%H5716><s%> from you <S%H3045><s%>, that I may know what to do unto you <S%H6213><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> stripped <S%H5337><s%> themselves of their jewelry <S%H5716><s%> by the mountain <S%H2022><s%> Horeb <S%H2722><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>, and pitched <S%H5186><s%> it outside <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>, afar off <S%H7368><s%> from the camp <S%H4264><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> it the Tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>. And it came to pass <S%H1245><s%>, that every one which sought the Lord <S%H3068><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> unto the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, which was outside <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H4872><s%>, when Moses went out <S%H3318><s%> unto the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>, that all the people <S%H5971><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%>, and stood <S%H5324><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> at his tent <S%H168><s%> door <S%H6607><s%>, and looked <S%H5027><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, until he was gone <S%H935><s%> into the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H4872><s%>, as Moses entered <S%H935><s%> into the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>, the cloudy <S%H6051><s%> pillar <S%H5982><s%> descended <S%H3381><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>, and the Lord talked <S%H1696><s%> with Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the cloudy <S%H6051><s%> pillar <S%H5982><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> at the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> door <S%H6607><s%>: and all the people <S%H5971><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> in his tent <S%H168><s%> door <S%H6607><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to face <S%H6440><s%>, as a man <S%H376><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> unto his friend <S%H7453><s%>. And he turned again <S%H7725><s%> into the camp <S%H4264><s%>: but his servant <S%H8334><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, a young man <S%H5288><s%>, departed <S%H4185><s%> not out <S%H8432><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, See <S%H7200><s%>, you sayest <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H5927><s%>, Bring up this people <S%H5971><s%>: and you have not let me know <S%H3045><s%> whom you will send <S%H7971><s%> with me <S%H559><s%>. Yet you have said, I know <S%H3045><s%> you by name <S%H8034><s%>, and you have also found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in my sight <S%H5869><s%>.

Now therefore <S%H4672><s%>, I pray you, if I have found grace <S%H2580><s%> in your sight <S%H5869><s%>, show <S%H3045><s%> me now your way <S%H1870><s%>, that I may know <S%H3045><s%> you <S%H4672><s%>, that I may find grace <S%H2580><s%> in your sight <S%H5869><s%>: and consider <S%H7200><s%> that this nation <S%H1471><s%> is your people <S%H5971><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, My presence <S%H6440><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> with you <S%H5117><s%>, and I will give you rest.
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H6440><s%>, If your presence go <S%H1980><s%> not with me <S%H5927><s%>, carry us not up here.

For where shall it be known <S%H3045><s%> here <S%H645><s%> that I and your people <S%H5971><s%> have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in your sight <S%H5869><s%>? is it not in that you go <S%H3212><s%> with us <S%H6395><s%>? so shall we be separated, I and your people <S%H5971><s%>, from all the people <S%H5971><s%> that are upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, I will do <S%H6213><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%> also that you have spoken <S%H1696><s%>: for you have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in my sight <S%H5869><s%>, and I know <S%H3045><s%> you by name <S%H8034><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, I beg you <S%H4994><s%>, show <S%H7200><s%> me your glory <S%H3519><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, I will make all my goodness <S%H2898><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> before you <S%H7121><s%>, and I will proclaim the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you and will be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to whom I will be gracious <S%H2603><s%>, and will show mercy <S%H7355><s%> on whom I will show mercy <S%H7355><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, You can <S%H3201><s%> not see <S%H7200><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%>: for there shall no man <S%H120><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> me <S%H2425><s%>, and live.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H4725><s%>, there is a place by me <S%H5324><s%>, and you shall stand upon a rock <S%H6697><s%>:

And it shall come to pass <S%H3519><s%>, while my glory passes by <S%H5674><s%>, that I will put <S%H7760><s%> you in a cleft <S%H5366><s%> of the rock <S%H6697><s%>, and will cover <S%H5526><s%> you with my hand <S%H3709><s%> while <S%H5704><s%> I pass by <S%H5674><s%>:
And I will take <S%H5493><s%> away my hand <S%H3709><s%>, and you shall see <S%H7200><s%> my back parts <S%H268><s%>: but my face <S%H6440><s%> shall not be seen <S%H7200><s%>.
